titles.title: To extend the Export Administration Act until November 20, 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. Hyde moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2602.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 116.

bill.summary: 7/30/2001--Passed House without amendment. Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to extend its export control authority through November 20, 2001 (currently, such authority terminates on August 20, 2001).
